git.changelog: if [ -n "$(git log --invert-grep -i -E --grep="Preparation for release|Release branch release/.*" --pretty=format:"* %s (%h)" ${from}...${to})" ]; then git log --invert-grep -i -E --grep="Preparation for release|Release branch release/.*" --pretty=format:"* %s (%h)" ${from}...${to}; else echo "No commits found since ${from}"; fi
